verses.verse: Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> unto <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people,<s%> <S%H524>nations,<s%> and <S%H3961>languages,<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> <S%H1753>dwell<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth;<s%> <S%H8001>Peace<s%> be <S%H7680>multiplied<s%> unto you.

I thought it <S%H8232>good<s%> <S%H6925><s%> to <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H852>signs<s%> and <S%H8540>wonders<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the <S%H5943>high<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> hath <S%H5648>wrought<s%> <S%H5974>toward<s%> me.

How <S%H4101><s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> are his <S%H852>signs!<s%> and <S%H4101>how<s%> <S%H8624>mighty<s%> are his <S%H8540>wonders!<s%> his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to <S%H1859>generation.<s%>
I <S%H576><s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> at <S%H7954>rest<s%> in mine <S%H1005>house,<s%> and <S%H7487>flourishing<s%> in my palace: <S%H1965><s%>

I <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H2493>dream<s%> which made me <S%H1763>afraid,<s%> and the <S%H2031>thoughts<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4903>bed<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> me.

Therefore <S%H4481>made<s%> <S%H7761><s%> I a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to bring <S%H5924>in<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> me, <S%H1768>that<s%> they might make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H2493>dream.<s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H5954>in<s%> the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> the <S%H826>astrologers,<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> and the <S%H1505>soothsayers:<s%> and <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> them; but they did <S%H3809>not<s%> make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

But <S%H5705>at<s%> the <S%H318>last<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> came <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> me, <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> according to the <S%H8036>name<s%> of my <S%H426>god,<s%> and in <S%H1768>whom<s%> is the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods:<s%> and <S%H6925>before<s%> him I <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> saying,

O <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H7229>master<s%> of the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> <S%H1768>because<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%> is in thee, and <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H3606><s%> <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H598>troubleth<s%> thee, <S%H560>tell<s%> me the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> I have <S%H2370>seen,<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

Thus were the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of mine <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> my <S%H4903>bed;<s%> I <S%H1934>saw,<s%> <S%H2370><s%> and <S%H431>behold<s%> a <S%H363>tree<s%> in the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H772>earth,<s%> and the <S%H7314>height<s%> thereof was <S%H7690>great.<s%>

The <S%H363>tree<s%> <S%H7236>grew,<s%> and was <S%H8631>strong,<s%> and the <S%H7314>height<s%> thereof <S%H4291>reached<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H2379>sight<s%> thereof to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> the earth: <S%H772><s%>

The <S%H6074>leaves<s%> thereof were <S%H8209>fair,<s%> and the <S%H4>fruit<s%> thereof <S%H7690>much,<s%> and in it was <S%H4203>meat<s%> for <S%H3606>all:<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> had <S%H2927>shadow<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> it, and the <S%H6853>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H1753>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H6056>boughs<s%> thereof, and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1321>flesh<s%> was <S%H2110>fed<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> it.

I <S%H1934>saw<s%> <S%H2370><s%> in the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4903>bed,<s%> and, <S%H431>behold,<s%> a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> came <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven;<s%>

He <S%H7123>cried<s%> <S%H2429>aloud,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus,<s%> Hew <S%H1414>down<s%> the <S%H363>tree,<s%> and cut <S%H7113>off<s%> his <S%H6056>branches,<s%> shake <S%H5426>off<s%> his <S%H6074>leaves,<s%> and <S%H921>scatter<s%> his <S%H4>fruit:<s%> let the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> get <S%H5111>away<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8479>under<s%> it, and the <S%H6853>fowls<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> his branches: <S%H6056><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H1297><s%> <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of his <S%H8330>roots<s%> in the <S%H772>earth,<s%> even with a <S%H613>band<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass,<s%> in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H1251>field;<s%> and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> in the <S%H6211>grass<s%> of the earth: <S%H772><s%>

Let his <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>man's,<s%> and let a <S%H2423>beast's<s%> <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> unto him; and let <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> him.

This <S%H6600>matter<s%> is by the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the <S%H5894>watchers,<s%> and the <S%H7595>demand<s%> by the <S%H3983>word<s%> of the holy <S%H6922>ones:<s%> <S%H5705>to<s%> the <S%H1701>intent<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the <S%H2417>living<s%> may <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> he <S%H6634>will,<s%> and setteth <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> it the <S%H8215>basest<s%> of <S%H606>men.<s%>

This <S%H1836><s%> <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> have <S%H2370>seen.<s%> Now <S%H607>thou,<s%> O <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H560>declare<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, forasmuch <S%H3606>as<s%> <S%H6903><s%> <S%H1768><s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> are not <S%H3202>able<s%> <S%H3809><s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation:<s%> but <S%H607>thou<s%> art <S%H3546>able;<s%> <S%H1768>for<s%> the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%> is in thee.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> was <S%H8075>astonished<s%> for <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H8160>hour,<s%> and his <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> him. The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spoke,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> let <S%H409>not<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> or the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, <S%H927>trouble<s%> thee. <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> My <S%H4756>lord,<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> be to them that <S%H8131>hate<s%> thee, and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof to thine <S%H6146>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H363>tree<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> thou <S%H2370>sawest,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H7236>grew,<s%> and was <S%H8631>strong,<s%> whose <S%H7314>height<s%> <S%H4291>reached<s%> unto the <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H2379>sight<s%> thereof to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth;<s%>

Whose <S%H6074>leaves<s%> were <S%H8209>fair,<s%> and the <S%H4>fruit<s%> thereof <S%H7690>much,<s%> and in it was <S%H4203>meat<s%> for <S%H3606>all;<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> which the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> <S%H1753>dwelt,<s%> and upon whose <S%H6056>branches<s%> the <S%H6853>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8065>heaven<s%> had their habitation: <S%H7932><s%>

It <S%H1932><s%> is <S%H607>thou,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> art <S%H7236>grown<s%> and become <S%H8631>strong:<s%> for thy <S%H7238>greatness<s%> is <S%H7236>grown,<s%> and <S%H4291>reacheth<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and thy <S%H7985>dominion<s%> to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

And <S%H1768>whereas<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> coming <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and <S%H560>saying,<s%> Hew the tree <S%H1414>down,<s%> <S%H363><s%> and <S%H2255>destroy<s%> it; <S%H1297>yet<s%> <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of the <S%H8330>roots<s%> thereof in the <S%H772>earth,<s%> even with a <S%H613>band<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass,<s%> in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H1251>field;<s%> and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field,<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> <S%H1768><s%> <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> him;

This <S%H1836><s%> is the <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H1932>this<s%> is the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the most <S%H5943>High,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is <S%H4291>come<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4756>lord<s%> the king: <S%H4430><s%>

That they shall <S%H2957>drive<s%> thee <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men,<s%> and thy <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field,<s%> and they shall make thee to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and they shall <S%H6647>wet<s%> thee with the <S%H4481>dew<s%> <S%H2920><s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> thee, <S%H5705>till<s%> <S%H1768><s%> thou <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> he <S%H6634>will.<s%>

And <S%H1768>whereas<s%> they <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H363>tree<s%> <S%H8330>roots;<s%> thy <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7011>sure<s%> unto thee, after <S%H4481>that<s%> <S%H1768><s%> thou shalt have <S%H3046>known<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> do <S%H7990>rule.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%H3861><s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> let my <S%H4431>counsel<s%> be <S%H8232>acceptable<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> thee, and <S%H6562>break<s%> off thy <S%H2408>sins<s%> by <S%H6665>righteousness,<s%> and thine <S%H5758>iniquities<s%> by showing <S%H2604>mercy<s%> to the <S%H6033>poor;<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> it may <S%H1934>be<s%> a <S%H754>lengthening<s%> of thy <S%H7963>tranquillity.<s%>
All <S%H3606>this<s%> <S%H4291>came<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>

At the <S%H7118>end<s%> of <S%H8648>twelve<s%> <S%H6236><s%> <S%H3393>months<s%> he <S%H1934>walked<s%> <S%H1981><s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> the <S%H1965>palace<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spoke,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> Is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1668>this<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> have <S%H1124>built<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> by the <S%H8632>might<s%> of my <S%H2632>power,<s%> and for the <S%H3367>honor<s%> of my <S%H1923>majesty?<s%>

While <S%H5751><s%> the <S%H4406>word<s%> was in the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H6433>mouth,<s%> there <S%H5308>fell<s%> a <S%H7032>voice<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> saying, O <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> to thee it is <S%H560>spoken;<s%> The <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is <S%H5709>departed<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> thee.

And they shall <S%H2957>drive<s%> thee <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men,<s%> and thy <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field:<s%> they shall make thee to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> thee, <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H1768><s%> thou <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> the most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> he <S%H6634>will.<s%>

The same <S%H8160>hour<s%> was the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H5487>fulfilled<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar:<s%> and he was <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men,<s%> and did <S%H399>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and his <S%H1655>body<s%> was <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H4481>dew<s%> <S%H2920><s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> <S%H1768><s%> his <S%H8177>hairs<s%> were <S%H7236>grown<s%> like <S%H5403>eagles'<s%> feathers, and his <S%H2953>nails<s%> like <S%H6853>birds'<s%> claws.

And at the <S%H7118>end<s%> of the <S%H3118>days<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> lifted <S%H5191>up<s%> mine <S%H5870>eyes<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and mine <S%H4486>understanding<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> me, and I <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the most <S%H5943>High,<s%> and I <S%H7624>praised<s%> and <S%H1922>honored<s%> him that <S%H2417>liveth<s%> <S%H5957>forever,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to generation: <S%H1859><s%>

And <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%> are <S%H2804>reputed<s%> as <S%H3809>nothing:<s%> and he <S%H5648>doeth<s%> according to his <S%H6634>will<s%> in the <S%H2429>army<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and among the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth:<s%> and <S%H3809>none<s%> <S%H383>can<s%> <S%H4223>stay<s%> his <S%H3028>hand,<s%> or <S%H560>say<s%> unto him, <S%H4101>What<s%> <S%H5648>doest<s%> thou?
